enabling_node_inclusion: Whakahohe i te aratau whakauru node, tatari koa...
enabling_node_exclusion: Whakahohe i te aratau whakakore node, tatari koa...
inclusion_message: Patohia te paatene i runga i te taputapu e hiahia ana koe ki te taapiri atu ki tenei whatunga.
exclusion_message: Patohia te paatene i runga i te taputapu e hiahia ana koe ki te tango mai i tenei whatunga.
task_duration_notice: Ka roa pea tenei mahi ki {{timeout}} hekona kia oti.
adding_node: Te taapiri i {{node}} taputapu, tatari koa...
removing_node: Kei te tango i {{node}} taputapu, tatari koa...
node_added: I momoho te taapiri i te {{node}} taputapu
association_description: Ka tukuna e enei taputapu nga purongo ki nga pokapu kei roto i nga roopu hononga. Kia whiwhi purongo mai i tenei taputapu, whakauruhia te node 1 (te kaiwhakahaere) ki nga roopu hononga.
generic_parameter_description: Whakauruhia te tau tawhā whirihoranga me te uara hei tautuhi.
calibration_parameter_not_set: Kaore i te tautuhia te tau tawhā whakatika
